author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: pure javascript version of https://www.npmjs.com/package/mongodb with zero npm dependencies
name: mongodb-minimal

scripts.preinstall: rm -fr node_modules && mkdir -p node_modules && ln -s ../bson node_modules/bson && ln -s ../mongodb node_modules/mongodb && ln -s ../mongodb-core node_modules/mongodb-core
